price: Kiní kan nínú ìṣírò-iṣẹ́ wọn kò sí lọ́rùn àwọn tó ń bẹ̀rù (Allāhu), ṣùgbọ́n ìṣítí ni nítorí kí wọ́n lè ṣọ́ra (fún Iná).
arabic: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَلَٰكِن ذِكۡرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ʿalā alladhīna yattaqūna min ḥisābihim min shayin walākin dhik'rā laʿallahum yattaqūna
